Verses: 2 manandhirumpungal, Paralogaraajyam Sameepiththirukkiradhu Endru Pirasangam Panninaan.

3 karththarukku Vazhiyai Aayaththappaduththungal; Avarukkup Paadhaigalaich Sevvaipannungal Endru Vanaandharaththil Kooppidugiravanudaiya Saththam Undendru, Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyinaal Sollappattavan Ivane.
4 indha Yovaan Ottakamayir Udaiyaith Thariththu, Than Araiyil Vaarkachchaiyaik Kattikkondirundhaan; Vettukkiliyum Kaattuth Thenum Avanukku Aagaaramaayirundhadhu.
5  Appozhudhu, Erusalem Nagaraththaarum, Yoodheyaa Dhesaththaar Anaivarum, Yordhaanukku Aduththa Sutruppuraththaar Yaavarum Avanitaththirkup Poi,
6  Thangal Paavangalai Arikkaiyittu Yordhaan Nadhiyil Avanaal Gnaanasnaanam Petraargal.
7  Pariseyarilum Sadhuseyarilum Anegar Thannidaththil Gnaanasnaanam Perumpadi Varukiradhai Avan Kandu: Viriyan Paambukkuttikale! Varungopaththukkuth Thappiththukkolla Ungalukku Vakaikaattinavan Yaar?

9  Aabiragaam Engalukkuth Thagappan Endru Ungalukkulle Sollikkolla Ninaiyaadhirungal; Dhevan Indhak Kallugalinaale Aabiragaamukkup Pillaikalai Undupanna Vallavaraayirukkiraar Endru Ungalukkuch Sollukiren.
10 ippozhudhe Kodariyaanadhu Marangalin Ver Aruge Vaiththirukkiradhu. Aagaiyaal Nalla Kanikodaadha Maramellaam Vettundu Akkiniyile Podappadum.

11 manandhirumpudhalukkendru Naan Jalaththinaal Ungalukku Gnaanasnaanam Kodukkiren; Enakkuppin Varugiravar Ennilum Vallavaraayirukkiraar, Avarudaiya Paadharatchaigalaich Sumakkiradharku Naan Paaththiran Alla; Avar Parisuththa Aaviyinaalum Akkiniyinaalum Gnaanasnaanam Koduppaar.
12 thootrukkoodai Avar Kaiyil Irukkiradhu; Avar Thamadhu Kalaththai Nandraai Vilakki, Thamadhu Kodhumaiyaik Kalanjiyaththil Serppaar; Padharaiyo Aviyaadha Akkiniyinaal Sutterippaar Endraan.
13  Appozhudhu Yovaanaal Gnaanasnaanam Peruvadharku Yesu Galileyaavaivittu Yordhaanukku Aruge Avanidaththil Vandhaar.
14 yovaan Avarukkuth Thadai Seydhu: Naan Ummaale Gnaanasnaanam Peravendiyadhaayirukka, Neer Ennidaththil Varalaamaa Endraan.
15 yesu Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Ippozhudhu Idangodu, Ippadi Ellaa Needhiyaiyum Niraivetruvadhu Namakku Etradhaayirukkiradhu Endraar. Appozhudhu Avarukku Idangoduththaan.
16 yesu Gnaanasnaanam Petru, Jalaththilirundhu Karaiyerinavudane, Idho Vaanam Avarukkuth Thirakkappattadhu; Dheva Aavi Puraavaippola Irangi, Thammel Varugiradhaik Kandaar.
17 andriyum, Vaanaththilirundhu Oru Saththam Undaagi, Ivar Ennudaiya Nesakumaaran, Ivaril Piriyamaayirukkiren Endru Uraiththadhu.
